/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking down its length. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The road itself is gray, marked with white lines for guidance. On the right side of the road, there's a building with a blue roof, standing out against the natural backdrop. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and perspective to the scene.
